name: Quinoa and Wild Rice Salad With Ginger Sesame Dressing
description: I like to use a mixture of grains in salads and pilafs. The fluffy, pale quinoa in this gingery salad contrasts nicely with the dark, chewy wild rice. You can serve this as a one-dish meal, a starter or a side dish.
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, quick, salads and dressings
recipeIngredient: 1 red bell pepper, cut in 2-inch strips
3 tablespoons chopped or thinly sliced spring onions or scallions
2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger (more to taste)
Leaf lettuce or radicchio for serving optional

recipeInstructions.text: Toss together all of the salad ingredients.
Whisk together the dressing ingredients. Toss with the salad ingredients, and serve — if desired, over a bed of lettuce or radicchio leaves.
